english.segment2: am I pretty enough for you?. am I beautiful enough for you?. do you love me? you say you do. do i believe it enough for you?
english.segment3: am i pretty?. am i alright?. am i pretty?. well, am i?
english.segment4: am i pretty enough for you?. I get nervous when people look at me and you. I admire you; why are you with me?. 'cause every day's a mirror. and I don't like what i see
english.segment5: 'cause I'm not pretty. I'm not alright. I'm not pretty. well, am I?
english.segment6: do you still love me?. do you still love me?. do you still love me?. still love me
